IncreaseDecreaseInAccruedIncomeTaxesPaya.description: The increase (decrease) during the period in the amount due for taxes based on the reporting entity's earnings or attributable to the entity's income earning process (business presence) within a given jurisdiction.

IncreaseDecreaseInFinanceReceivables.label: Increase (Decrease) in Finance Receivables
IncreaseDecreaseInFinanceReceivables.description: The increase (decrease) during the reporting period in outstanding loans including accrued interest.

IncreaseDecreaseInOtherReceivables.label: Increase (Decrease) in Other Receivables
IncreaseDecreaseInOtherReceivables.description: Amount of increase (decrease) in receivables classified as other.

InterestExpense.label: Interest Expense
InterestExpense.description: Amount of the cost of borrowed funds accounted for as interest expense.

InterestIncomeExpenseNet.label: Interest Income (Expense), Net
InterestIncomeExpenseNet.description: The net amount of operating interest income (expense).

InterestIncomeRelatedParty.label: Interest Income, Related Party
InterestIncomeRelatedParty.description: Amount of interest income earned from interest-bearing assets owed to the entity by related party.

InterestPaidNet.label: Interest Paid, Excluding Capitalized Interest, Operating Activities
InterestPaidNet.description: Amount of cash paid for interest, excluding capitalized interest, classified as operating activity. Includes, but is not limited to, payment to settle zero-coupon bond for accreted interest of debt discount and debt instrument with insignificant coupon interest rate in relation to effective interest rate of borrowing attributable to accreted interest of debt discount.

InvestmentIncomeDividend.label: Investment Income, Dividend
InvestmentIncomeDividend.description: Amount of dividend income on nonoperating securities.

InvestmentIncomeNet.label: Investment Income, Net
InvestmentIncomeNet.description: Amount after accretion (amortization) of discount (premium), and investment expense, of interest income and dividend income on nonoperating securities.

InvestmentOwnedAtFairValue.label: Investment Owned, at Fair Value
InvestmentOwnedAtFairValue.description: Value of the investment at close of period. For schedules of investments that are categorized, the value would be aggregated by category. For investment in and advances to affiliates, if operations of any controlled companies are different in character from those of the company, group such affiliates within divisions and by type of activities.

InvestmentOwnedBalancePrincipalAmount.label: Investment Owned, Balance, Principal Amount
InvestmentOwnedBalancePrincipalAmount.description: For investments which are quantified by principal amount, the principle balance held at close of period.

Investments.label: Investments
Investments.description: Sum of the carrying amounts as of the balance sheet date of all investments.

LiabilitiesFairValueAdjustment.label: Liabilities, Fair Value Adjustment
LiabilitiesFairValueAdjustment.description: Amount of addition (reduction) to the amount at which a liability could be incurred (settled) in a current transaction between willing parties.

LineOfCredit.label: Long-term Line of Credit
LineOfCredit.description: The carrying value as of the balance sheet date of the current and noncurrent portions of long-term obligations drawn from a line of credit, which is a bank's commitment to make loans up to a specific amount. Examples of items that might be included in the application of this element may consist of letters of credit, standby letters of credit, and revolving credit arrangements, under which borrowings can be made up to a maximum amount as of any point in time conditional on satisfaction of specified terms before, as of and after the date of drawdowns on the line. Includes short-term obligations that would normally be classified as current liabilities but for which (a) postbalance sheet date issuance of a long term obligation to refinance the short term obligation on a long term basis, or (b) the enterprise has entered into a financing agreement that clearly permits the enterprise to refinance the short-term obligation on a long term basis and the following conditions are met (1) the agreement does not expire within 1 year and is not cancelable by the lender except for violation of an objectively determinable provision, (2) no violation exists at the BS date, and (3) the lender has entered into the financing agreement is expected to be financially capable of honoring the agreement.

LoansAndLeasesReceivableAllowance.label: Loans and Leases Receivable, Allowance
LoansAndLeasesReceivableAllowance.description: Amount of allowance to cover probable credit losses on loans and leases. Includes carryover of or adjustments to the allowance for loan losses in connection with business combinations. Excludes allowance for loans and leases covered under loss sharing agreements.

LoansAndLeasesReceivableNetReportedAmoun.label: Loans and Leases Receivable, Net Amount
LoansAndLeasesReceivableNetReportedAmoun.description: Amount after allowance and deduction of deferred interest and fees, unamortized costs and premiums and discounts from face amounts, of loans and leases held in portfolio, including but not limited to, commercial and consumer loans. Excludes loans and leases covered under loss sharing agreements and loans held for sale.

LoansPayableCurrent.label: Loans Payable, Current
LoansPayableCurrent.description: Carrying value as of the balance sheet date of portion of long-term loans payable due within one year or the operating cycle if longer.

LoansPayableToBank.label: Loans Payable to Bank
LoansPayableToBank.description: Including the current and noncurrent portions, carrying value as of the balance sheet date of loans from a bank with maturities initially due after one year or beyond the normal operating cycle if longer.

LongTermInvestments.label: Long-term Investments
LongTermInvestments.description: The total amount of investments that are intended to be held for an extended period of time (longer than one operating cycle).

LongTermLoansFromBank.label: Loans Payable to Bank, Noncurrent
LongTermLoansFromBank.description: Carrying value as of the balance sheet date of loans from a bank with maturities initially due after one year or beyond the operating cycle if longer, excluding current portion.

LossContingencyReceivable.label: Loss Contingency, Receivable
LossContingencyReceivable.description: Amount of receivable related to a loss contingency accrual. For example, an insurance recovery receivable.

LossOnSaleOfInvestments.label: Loss on Sale of Investments
LossOnSaleOfInvestments.description: The difference between the carrying value and the sale price of an investment. A loss would be recognized when the sale price of the investment is less than the carrying value of the investment. This element refers to the Loss included in earnings and not to the cash proceeds of the sale.

MarketableSecurities.label: Marketable Securities
MarketableSecurities.description: Amount of investment in marketable security.

MoneyMarketFundsAtCarryingValue.label: Money Market Funds, at Carrying Value
MoneyMarketFundsAtCarryingValue.description: Investment in short-term money-market instruments (such as commercial paper, banker's acceptances, repurchase agreements, government securities, certificates of deposit, and so forth) which are highly liquid (that is, readily convertible to known amounts of cash) and so near their maturity that they present an insignificant risk of changes in value because of changes in interest rates. Generally, only investments with original maturities of three months or less qualify as cash equivalents by definition. Original maturity means an original maturity to the entity holding the investment. For example, both a three-month US Treasury bill and a three-year Treasury note purchased three months from maturity qualify as cash equivalents. However, a Treasury note purchased three-years ago does not become a cash equivalent when its remaining maturity is three months.

NetCashProvidedByUsedInOperatingActiviti.label: Net Cash Provided by (Used in) Operating Activities, Continuing Operations
NetCashProvidedByUsedInOperatingActiviti.description: Amount of cash inflow (outflow) from operating activities, excluding discontinued operations. Operating activity cash flows include transactions, adjustments, and changes in value not defined as investing or financing activities.

NetInvestmentInLeaseCurrent.label: Net Investment in Lease, Current
NetInvestmentInLeaseCurrent.description: Amount of net investment in sales-type and direct financing lease, classified as current.

NetInvestmentInLeaseNoncurrent.label: Net Investment in Lease, Noncurrent
NetInvestmentInLeaseNoncurrent.description: Amount of net investment in sales-type and direct financing lease, classified as noncurrent.

NoncontrollingInterestInNetIncomeLossOth.label: Noncontrolling Interest in Net Income (Loss) Other Noncontrolling Interests, Redeemable
NoncontrollingInterestInNetIncomeLossOth.description: Amount after tax of income (loss) attributable to other redeemable noncontrolling equity holder.

NoninterestExpenseCommissionExpense.label: Noninterest Expense Commission Expense
NoninterestExpenseCommissionExpense.description: Amount of fees incurred for commissions on mutual funds and insurance products.

NoninterestIncome.label: Noninterest Income
NoninterestIncome.description: The total amount of noninterest income which may be derived from: (1) fees and commissions; (2) premiums earned; (3) insurance policy charges; (4) the sale or disposal of assets; and (5) other sources not otherwise specified.

NotesPayable.label: Notes Payable
NotesPayable.description: Including the current and noncurrent portions, aggregate carrying amount of all types of notes payable, as of the balance sheet date, with initial maturities beyond one year or beyond the normal operating cycle, if longer.

OperatingIncomeLoss.label: Operating Income (Loss)
OperatingIncomeLoss.description: The net result for the period of deducting operating expenses from operating revenues.

OperatingLeasePayments.label: Operating Lease, Payments
OperatingLeasePayments.description: Amount of cash outflow from operating lease, excluding payments to bring another asset to condition and location necessary for its intended use.

OtherComprehensiveIncomeLossForeignCurre.label: Other Comprehensive Income (Loss), Foreign Currency Translation Adjustment, Tax
OtherComprehensiveIncomeLossForeignCurre.description: Amount of tax expense (benefit), after reclassification adjustments of gain (loss) on foreign currency translation adjustments, foreign currency transactions designated and effective as economic hedges of a net investment in a foreign entity and intra-entity foreign currency transactions that are of a long-term-investment nature.

OtherGeneralAndAdministrativeExpense.label: Other General and Administrative Expense
OtherGeneralAndAdministrativeExpense.description: Amount of general and administrative expense classified as other.

OtherInterestAndDividendIncome.label: Other Interest and Dividend Income
OtherInterestAndDividendIncome.description: Amount, after discount, accretion and premium amortization, of interest income and dividend income classified as other.

OtherLoansPayable.label: Other Loans Payable
OtherLoansPayable.description: Amount of long-term loans payable classified as other.

OtherLongTermDebt.label: Other Long-term Debt
OtherLongTermDebt.description: Amount of long-term debt classified as other.

OtherReceivablesNetCurrent.label: Other Receivables, Net, Current
OtherReceivablesNetCurrent.description: Amount, after allowance, of receivables classified as other, due within one year or the operating cycle, if longer.

OtherThanTemporaryImpairmentLossesInvest.label: Other than Temporary Impairment Losses, Investments, Portion in Other Comprehensive Loss, Tax, Including Portion Attributable to Noncontrolling Interest
OtherThanTemporaryImpairmentLossesInvest.description: Amount of tax (expense) benefit for other than temporary impairment loss (OTTI) on investments in available-for-sale and held-to-maturity debt securities, recognized in other comprehensive loss.

PaymentsForBrokerageFees.label: Payments for Brokerage Fees
PaymentsForBrokerageFees.description: The amount of cash paid for brokerage fees during the current period. This element is intended to represent the brokerage fees paid by and between financial industry participants.

PaymentsOfDividends.label: Payments of Dividends
PaymentsOfDividends.description: Cash outflow in the form of capital distributions and dividends to common shareholders, preferred shareholders and noncontrolling interests.

PaymentsToAcquireBusinessesNetOfCashAcqu.label: Payments to Acquire Businesses, Net of Cash Acquired
PaymentsToAcquireBusinessesNetOfCashAcqu.description: The cash outflow associated with the acquisition of a business, net of the cash acquired from the purchase.

PaymentsToAcquireInvestments.label: Payments to Acquire Investments
PaymentsToAcquireInvestments.description: The cash outflow associated with the purchase of all investments (debt, security, other) during the period.

PaymentsToAcquirePropertyPlantAndEquipme.label: Payments to Acquire Property, Plant, and Equipment
PaymentsToAcquirePropertyPlantAndEquipme.description: The cash outflow associated with the acquisition of long-lived, physical assets that are used in the normal conduct of business to produce goods and services and not intended for resale; includes cash outflows to pay for construction of self-constructed assets.

PaymentsToFundLongtermLoansToRelatedPart.label: Payments to Fund Long-term Loans to Related Parties
PaymentsToFundLongtermLoansToRelatedPart.description: The cash outflow associated with extending a long-term loan to a related party. Alternate caption: Payments for Advances to Affiliates.

PreferredStockRedemptionPricePerShare.label: Preferred Stock, Redemption Price Per Share
PreferredStockRedemptionPricePerShare.description: The price per share at which the preferred stock of an entity that has priority over common stock in the distribution of dividends and in the event of liquidation of the entity is redeemed or may be called at. The redemption features of this preferred stock are solely within the control of the issuer.

PrepaidExpenseAndOtherAssetsCurrent.label: Prepaid Expense and Other Assets, Current
PrepaidExpenseAndOtherAssetsCurrent.description: Amount of asset related to consideration paid in advance for costs that provide economic benefits in future periods, and amount of other assets that are expected to be realized or consumed within one year or the normal operating cycle, if longer.

ProceedsFromCollectionOfLongtermLoansToR.label: Proceeds from Collection of Long-term Loans to Related Parties
ProceedsFromCollectionOfLongtermLoansToR.description: The cash inflow associated with collection, whether partial or full, of long-term loans to a related party. Alternate caption: Proceeds from Advances to Affiliates.

ProceedsFromIssuanceOfLongTermDebt.label: Proceeds from Issuance of Long-term Debt
ProceedsFromIssuanceOfLongTermDebt.description: The cash inflow from a debt initially having maturity due after one year or beyond the operating cycle, if longer.

ProceedsFromOtherShortTermDebt.label: Proceeds from Other Short-term Debt
ProceedsFromOtherShortTermDebt.description: Amount of cash inflow from short-term debt classified as other.

ProceedsFromRepurchaseOfEquity.label: Proceeds from (Repurchase of) Equity
ProceedsFromRepurchaseOfEquity.description: The net cash inflow or outflow resulting from the entity's share transaction.

ProceedsFromSaleOfEquityMethodInvestment.label: Proceeds from Sale of Equity Method Investments
ProceedsFromSaleOfEquityMethodInvestment.description: The cash inflow associated with the sale of equity method investments, which are investments in joint ventures and entities in which the entity has an equity ownership interest normally of 20 to 50 percent and exercises significant influence.

ProceedsFromSaleOfOtherReceivables.label: Proceeds from Sale of Other Receivables
ProceedsFromSaleOfOtherReceivables.description: Amount of cash inflow from the sale of receivables classified as other.

PropertyPlantAndEquipmentGross.label: Property, Plant and Equipment, Gross
PropertyPlantAndEquipmentGross.description: Amount before accumulated depreciation, depletion and amortization of physical assets used in the normal conduct of business and not intended for resale. Examples include, but are not limited to, land, buildings, machinery and equipment, office equipment, and furniture and fixtures.

PropertyPlantAndEquipmentNet.label: Property, Plant and Equipment, Net
PropertyPlantAndEquipmentNet.description: Amount after accumulated depreciation, depletion and amortization of physical assets used in the normal conduct of business to produce goods and services and not intended for resale. Examples include, but are not limited to, land, buildings, machinery and equipment, office equipment, and furniture and fixtures.

PropertyPlantAndEquipmentOtherAccumulate.label: Property, Plant and Equipment, Other, Accumulated Depreciation
PropertyPlantAndEquipmentOtherAccumulate.description: Amount of accumulated depreciation of long-lived, physical assets used to produce goods and services and not intended for resale, classified as other.

ProvisionForOtherLosses.label: Provision for Other Losses
ProvisionForOtherLosses.description: Amount of expense related to other loss.

RealizedInvestmentGainsLosses.label: Realized Investment Gains (Losses)
RealizedInvestmentGainsLosses.description: Amount of realized gain (loss) on investment.

RedemptionPremium.label: Redemption Premium
RedemptionPremium.description: The excess of the (1) fair value of consideration transferred to the holders of a security in excess of (2) the carrying amount of the security reported on the registrant's balance sheet, which will be deducted from net earnings to derive net earnings available to common shareholders. This amount is generally an adjustment considered in the computation of earnings per share.

RelatedPartiesAmountInCostOfSales.label: Related Parties Amount in Cost of Sales
RelatedPartiesAmountInCostOfSales.description: Amount included in cost of sales related to transactions with related parties incurred and recorded in the statement of operations for the period.

RelatedPartyTransactionDueFromToRelatedP.label: Related Party Transaction, Due from (to) Related Party
RelatedPartyTransactionDueFromToRelatedP.description: Receivables to be collected from (obligations owed to) related parties, net as of the balance sheet date where one party can exercise control or significant influence over another party; including affiliates, owners or officers and their immediate families, pension trusts, and so forth.

RentalIncomeNonoperating.label: Rental Income, Nonoperating
RentalIncomeNonoperating.description: Income earned by providing the use of assets to an outside party in exchange for a payment or series of payments that is nonoperating in nature.

RepaymentsOfBankDebt.label: Repayments of Bank Debt
RepaymentsOfBankDebt.description: The cash outflow to settle a bank borrowing during the year.

RestrictedCash.label: Restricted Cash
RestrictedCash.description: Amount of cash restricted as to withdrawal or usage. Cash includes, but is not limited to, currency on hand, demand deposits with banks or financial institutions, and other accounts with general characteristics of demand deposits.

RestrictedCashAndCashEquivalents.label: Restricted Cash and Cash Equivalents
RestrictedCashAndCashEquivalents.description: Amount of cash and cash equivalents restricted as to withdrawal or usage. Cash includes, but is not limited to, currency on hand, demand deposits with banks or financial institutions, and other accounts with general characteristics of demand deposits. Cash equivalents include, but are not limited to, short-term, highly liquid investments that are both readily convertible to known amounts of cash and so near their maturity that they present insignificant risk of changes in value because of changes in interest rates.

RestrictedCashAndCashEquivalentsNoncurre.label: Restricted Cash and Cash Equivalents, Noncurrent
RestrictedCashAndCashEquivalentsNoncurre.description: Amount of cash and cash equivalents restricted as to withdrawal or usage, classified as noncurrent. Cash includes, but is not limited to, currency on hand, demand deposits with banks or financial institutions, and other accounts with general characteristics of demand deposits. Cash equivalents include, but are not limited to, short-term, highly liquid investments that are both readily convertible to known amounts of cash and so near their maturity that they present insignificant risk of changes in value because of changes in interest rates.

RestrictedCashCurrent.label: Restricted Cash, Current
RestrictedCashCurrent.description: Amount of cash restricted as to withdrawal or usage, classified as current. Cash includes, but is not limited to, currency on hand, demand deposits with banks or financial institutions, and other accounts with general characteristics of demand deposits.

RestrictedCashEquivalents.label: Restricted Cash Equivalents
RestrictedCashEquivalents.description: Amount of cash equivalents restricted as to withdrawal or usage. Cash equivalents include, but are not limited to, short-term, highly liquid investments that are both readily convertible to known amounts of cash and so near their maturity that they present insignificant risk of changes in value because of changes in interest rates.

RestrictedCashEquivalentsCurrent.label: Restricted Cash Equivalents, Current
RestrictedCashEquivalentsCurrent.description: Amount of cash equivalents restricted as to withdrawal or usage, classified as current. Cash equivalents include, but are not limited to, short-term, highly liquid investments that are both readily convertible to known amounts of cash and so near their maturity that they present insignificant risk of changes in value because of changes in interest rates.

ResultsOfOperationsIncomeBeforeIncomeTax.label: Results of Operations, Income before Income Taxes
ResultsOfOperationsIncomeBeforeIncomeTax.description: Income before income taxes for oil and gas producing activities.

RevenueFromRelatedParties.label: Revenue from Related Parties
RevenueFromRelatedParties.description: Amount of revenue, fees and commissions earned from transactions between (a) a parent company and its subsidiaries; (b) subsidiaries of a common parent; (c) an entity and trusts for the benefit of employees, for example, but not limited to, pension and profit-sharing trusts that are managed by or under the trusteeship of the entity's management; (d) an entity and its principal, owners, management, or members of their immediate families; and (e) affiliates.

RevenueNotFromContractWithCustomerOther.label: Revenue Not from Contract with Customer, Other
RevenueNotFromContractWithCustomerOther.description: Amount of revenue that is not accounted for under Topic 606, classified as other.

Revenues.label: Revenues
Revenues.description: Amount of revenue recognized from goods sold, services rendered, insurance premiums, or other activities that constitute an earning process. Includes, but is not limited to, investment and interest income before deduction of interest expense when recognized as a component of revenue, and sales and trading gain (loss).

SellingAndMarketingExpense.label: Selling and Marketing Expense
SellingAndMarketingExpense.description: The aggregate total amount of expenses directly related to the marketing or selling of products or services.

ShareBasedCompensation.label: Share-based Payment Arrangement, Noncash Expense
ShareBasedCompensation.description: Amount of noncash expense for share-based payment arrangement.

ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.label: Share-based Compensation Arrangement by Share-based Payment Award, Number of Shares Available for Grant
ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.description: The difference between the maximum number of shares (or other type of equity) authorized for issuance under the plan (including the effects of amendments and adjustments), and the sum of: 1) the number of shares (or other type of equity) already issued upon exercise of options or other equity-based awards under the plan; and 2) shares (or other type of equity) reserved for issuance on granting of outstanding awards, net of cancellations and forfeitures, if applicable.

ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.label: Share-based Compensation Arrangement by Share-based Payment Award, Options, Grants in Period, Gross
ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.description: Gross number of share options (or share units) granted during the period.

ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.label: Share-based Compensation Arrangement by Share-based Payment Award, Options, Outstanding, Number
ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.description: Number of options outstanding, including both vested and non-vested options.

ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.label: Share-based Compensation Arrangement by Share-based Payment Award, Options, Outstanding, Weighted Average Exercise Price
ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.description: Weighted average price at which grantees can acquire the shares reserved for issuance under the stock option plan.

ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.label: Share-based Compensation Arrangement by Share-based Payment Award, Percentage of Outstanding Stock Maximum
ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.description: Maximum number of shares that may be issued in accordance with the plan as a proportion of outstanding capital stock.

ShareBasedCompensationArrangementsByShar.label: Share-based Compensation Arrangements by Share-based Payment Award, Options, Grants in Period, Weighted Average Exercise Price
ShareBasedCompensationArrangementsByShar.description: Weighted average per share amount at which grantees can acquire shares of common stock by exercise of options.

ShortTermBorrowings.label: Short-term Debt
ShortTermBorrowings.description: Reflects the total carrying amount as of the balance sheet date of debt having initial terms less than one year or the normal operating cycle, if longer.

StockholdersEquityNoteSubscriptionsRecei.label: Stockholders' Equity Note, Subscriptions Receivable
StockholdersEquityNoteSubscriptionsRecei.description: Note received instead of cash as contribution to equity. The transaction may be a sale of capital stock or a contribution to paid-in capital.

StockholdersEquityOther.label: Stockholders' Equity, Other
StockholdersEquityOther.description: This element represents movements included in the statement of changes in stockholders' equity which are not separately disclosed or provided for elsewhere in the taxonomy.

StockIssuedDuringPeriodValueAcquisitions.label: Stock Issued During Period, Value, Acquisitions
StockIssuedDuringPeriodValueAcquisitions.description: Value of stock issued pursuant to acquisitions during the period.

StockIssuedDuringPeriodValueIssuedForSer.label: Stock Issued During Period, Value, Issued for Services
StockIssuedDuringPeriodValueIssuedForSer.description: Value of stock issued in lieu of cash for services contributed to the entity. Value of the stock issued includes, but is not limited to, services contributed by vendors and founders.

StockIssuedDuringPeriodValueStockDividen.label: Stock Issued During Period, Value, Stock Dividend
StockIssuedDuringPeriodValueStockDividen.description: Value of stock issued to shareholders as a dividend during the period.

StockRepurchasedDuringPeriodShares.label: Stock Repurchased During Period, Shares
StockRepurchasedDuringPeriodShares.description: Number of shares that have been repurchased during the period and have not been retired and are not held in treasury. Some state laws may govern the circumstances under which an entity may acquire its own stock and prescribe the accounting treatment therefore. This element is used when state law does not recognize treasury stock.

StockRepurchasedDuringPeriodValue.label: Stock Repurchased During Period, Value
StockRepurchasedDuringPeriodValue.description: Equity impact of the value of stock that has been repurchased during the period and has not been retired and is not held in treasury. Some state laws may mandate the circumstances under which an entity may acquire its own stock and prescribe the accounting treatment therefore. This element is used when state law does not recognize treasury stock.

TaxesPayableCurrent.label: Taxes Payable, Current
TaxesPayableCurrent.description: Carrying value as of the balance sheet date of obligations incurred and payable for statutory income, sales, use, payroll, excise, real, property and other taxes. Used to reflect the current portion of the liabilities (due within one year or within the normal operating cycle if longer).

TemporaryEquityDividendsAdjustment.label: Temporary Equity, Dividends, Adjustment
TemporaryEquityDividendsAdjustment.description: Accretion of temporary equity during the period due to cash, stock, and in-kind dividends. This item is an adjustment to net income necessary to derive net income apportioned to common stockholders and is to be distinguished from Temporary Equity, Accretion of Dividends (Temporary Equity, Accretion of Dividends).

TradingSecuritiesRealizedGain.label: Trading Securities, Realized Gain
TradingSecuritiesRealizedGain.description: This item represents the gain realized during the period from the sale of trading securities.

TransferToOtherRealEstate.label: Real Estate Owned, Transfer to Real Estate Owned
TransferToOtherRealEstate.description: Value transferred from mortgage loans to real estate owned (REO) in noncash transactions.

UnsecuredDebt.label: Unsecured Debt
UnsecuredDebt.description: Including the current and noncurrent portions, carrying value as of the balance sheet date of uncollateralized debt obligations (with maturities initially due after one year or beyond the operating cycle if longer).

WeightedAverageBasicSharesOutstandingPro.label: Weighted Average Basic Shares Outstanding, Pro Forma
WeightedAverageBasicSharesOutstandingPro.description: The weighted average number of shares (units) outstanding in the calculation of pro forma basic earnings per share (earnings per unit), which is commonly presented in initial public offerings based on the terms of the offering.

WeightedAverageNumberDilutedSharesOutsta.label: Weighted Average Number Diluted Shares Outstanding Adjustment
WeightedAverageNumberDilutedSharesOutsta.description: The sum of dilutive potential common shares or units used in the calculation of the diluted per-share or per-unit computation.

WeightedAverageNumberOfDilutedSharesOuts.label: Weighted Average Number of Shares Outstanding, Diluted
WeightedAverageNumberOfDilutedSharesOuts.description: The average number of shares or units issued and outstanding that are used in calculating diluted EPS or earnings per unit (EPU), determined based on the timing of issuance of shares or units in the period.

AssetsFairValueAdjustment.label: Assets, Fair Value Adjustment
AssetsFairValueAdjustment.description: Amount of addition (reduction) to the amount at which an asset could be incurred (settled) in a current transaction between willing parties.

CostsAndExpensesRelatedParty.label: Costs and Expenses, Related Party
CostsAndExpensesRelatedParty.description: Costs of sales and operating expenses for the period incurred from transactions with related parties.

DebtInstrumentFaceAmount.label: Debt Instrument, Face Amount
DebtInstrumentFaceAmount.description: Face (par) amount of debt instrument at time of issuance.

DefinedBenefitPlanForeignCurrencyExchang.label: Defined Benefit Plan, Benefit Obligation, Foreign Currency Translation Gain (Loss)
DefinedBenefitPlanForeignCurrencyExchang.description: Amount of foreign currency translation gain (loss) which (increases) decreases benefit obligation of defined benefit plan.

EmployeeBenefitsAndShareBasedCompensatio.label: Employee Benefits and Share-based Compensation
EmployeeBenefitsAndShareBasedCompensatio.description: Amount of expense for employee benefit and equity-based compensation.

EmployeeServiceShareBasedCompensationTax.label: Share-based Payment Arrangement, Expense, Tax Benefit
EmployeeServiceShareBasedCompensationTax.description: Amount of tax benefit for recognition of expense of award under share-based payment arrangement.

FairValueOptionChangesInFairValueGainLos.label: Fair Value, Option, Changes in Fair Value, Gain (Loss)
FairValueOptionChangesInFairValueGainLos.description: For each line item in the statement of financial position, the amounts of gains and losses from fair value changes included in earnings.

InterestExpenseLesseeAssetsUnderCapitalL.label: Interest Expense, Lessee, Assets under Capital Lease
InterestExpenseLesseeAssetsUnderCapitalL.description: The amount, during the lease term, of each minimum [capital] lease payment allocated to interest expense so as to produce a constant periodic rate of interest on the remaining balance of the capital lease obligation.

InterestIncomeOperating.label: Interest Income, Operating
InterestIncomeOperating.description: Amount of operating interest income, including, but not limited to, amortization and accretion of premiums and discounts on securities.

InvestmentOwnedBalanceShares.label: Investment Owned, Balance, Shares
InvestmentOwnedBalanceShares.description: Balance held at close of period in number of shares.

NotesReceivableNet.label: Financing Receivable, after Allowance for Credit Loss
NotesReceivableNet.description: Amount, after allowance for credit loss, of financing receivable. Excludes financing receivable covered under loss sharing agreement.

OperatingLeaseRightOfUseAssetAmortizatio.label: Operating Lease, Right-of-Use Asset, Amortization Expense
OperatingLeaseRightOfUseAssetAmortizatio.description: Amount of amortization expense for right-of-use asset from operating lease.

OtherAdditionalCapital.label: Other Additional Capital
OtherAdditionalCapital.description: Amount of additional paid-in capital (APIC) classified as other.

OtherCommitment.label: Other Commitment
OtherCommitment.description: Minimum amount of other commitment not otherwise specified in the taxonomy. Excludes commitments explicitly modeled in the taxonomy, including but not limited to, long-term and short-term purchase commitments, recorded and unrecorded purchase obligations, supply commitments, registration payment arrangements, leases, debt, product warranties, guarantees, environmental remediation obligations, and pensions.

OtherLiabilitiesCurrent.label: Other Liabilities, Current
OtherLiabilitiesCurrent.description: Amount of liabilities classified as other, due within one year or the normal operating cycle, if longer.

OtherNotesPayable.label: Other Notes Payable
OtherNotesPayable.description: Amount of long-term notes payable classified as other.

OtherTaxExpenseBenefit.label: Other Tax Expense (Benefit)
OtherTaxExpenseBenefit.description: Amount of other income tax expense (benefit).

PaymentsToAcquireNotesReceivable.label: Payments to Acquire Notes Receivable
PaymentsToAcquireNotesReceivable.description: The cash outflow to acquire an agreement for an unconditional promise by the maker to pay the entity (holder) a definite sum of money at a future date. Such amount may include accrued interest receivable in accordance with the terms of the note. The note also may contain provisions including a discount or premium, payable on demand, secured, or unsecured, interest bearing or noninterest bearing, among myriad other features and characteristics.

AccruedBonusesCurrentAndNoncurrent.label: Accrued Bonuses
AccruedBonusesCurrentAndNoncurrent.description: Carrying value as of the balance sheet date of obligations incurred and payable for incentive compensation awarded to employees and directors or earned by them based on the terms of one or more relevant arrangements.

AdjustmentsToAdditionalPaidInCapitalOthe.label: Adjustments to Additional Paid in Capital, Other
AdjustmentsToAdditionalPaidInCapitalOthe.description: Amount of other increase (decrease) in additional paid in capital (APIC).

AllocatedShareBasedCompensationExpense.label: Share-based Payment Arrangement, Expense
AllocatedShareBasedCompensationExpense.description: Amount of expense for award under share-based payment arrangement. Excludes amount capitalized.

AssetsHeldForSaleNotPartOfDisposalGroup.label: Assets Held-for-sale, Not Part of Disposal Group
AssetsHeldForSaleNotPartOfDisposalGroup.description: Amount of assets held-for-sale that are not part of a disposal group.

AssetsHeldForSaleNotPartOfDisposalGroupC.label: Assets Held-for-sale, Not Part of Disposal Group, Current
AssetsHeldForSaleNotPartOfDisposalGroupC.description: Amount of assets held-for-sale that are not part of a disposal group, expected to be sold within a year or the normal operating cycle, if longer.

CommonStockSharesHeldInEmployeeTrustShar.label: Common Stock, Shares Held in Employee Trust, Shares
CommonStockSharesHeldInEmployeeTrustShar.description: Number of common stock held in a trust that has been set up specifically to accumulate stock for the sole purpose of distribution to participating employees but not yet earned.

DeferredCompensationArrangementWithIndiv.label: Deferred Compensation Arrangement with Individual, Shares Issued
DeferredCompensationArrangementWithIndiv.description: Number of shares issued pursuant to the terms of a deferred compensation arrangement.

DeferredIncomeTaxLiabilities.label: Deferred Tax Liabilities, Gross
DeferredIncomeTaxLiabilities.description: Amount of deferred tax liability attributable to taxable temporary differences.

DeferredTaxLiabilitiesOther.label: Deferred Tax Liabilities, Other
DeferredTaxLiabilitiesOther.description: Amount of deferred tax liability attributable to taxable temporary differences classified as other.

DepositsAssetsNoncurrent.label: Deposits Assets, Noncurrent
DepositsAssetsNoncurrent.description: Carrying value of amounts transferred to third parties for security purposes that are expected to be returned or applied towards payment after one year or beyond the operating cycle, if longer.

FinancingReceivableReclassificationToHel.label: Financing Receivable, Reclassification to Held-for-sale
FinancingReceivableReclassificationToHel.description: Amount of financing receivable reclassified to held-for-sale.

GainLossRelatedToLitigationSettlement.label: Gain (Loss) Related to Litigation Settlement
GainLossRelatedToLitigationSettlement.description: Amount of gain (loss) recognized in settlement of litigation and insurance claims. Excludes claims within an insurance entity's normal claims settlement process.

IncomeTaxesPaid.label: Income Taxes Paid
IncomeTaxesPaid.description: The amount of cash paid during the current period to foreign, federal, state, and local authorities as taxes on income.

InvestmentSoldNotYetPurchasedBalanceShar.label: Investment Sold, Not yet Purchased, Balance, Shares
InvestmentSoldNotYetPurchasedBalanceShar.description: Number of securities sold short (the short position) as of the end of the period.

IssuanceOfStockAndWarrantsForServicesOrC.label: Issuance of Stock and Warrants for Services or Claims
IssuanceOfStockAndWarrantsForServicesOrC.description: Fair value of share-based compensation granted to nonemployees as payment for services rendered or acknowledged claims.

LesseeOperatingLeaseLiabilityPaymentsDue.label: Lessee, Operating Lease, Liability, to be Paid
LesseeOperatingLeaseLiabilityPaymentsDue.description: Amount of lessee's undiscounted obligation for lease payment for operating lease.

LesseeOperatingLeaseLiabilityPaymentsDue.label: Lessee, Operating Lease, Liability, to be Paid, after Year Five
LesseeOperatingLeaseLiabilityPaymentsDue.description: Amount of lessee's undiscounted obligation for lease payment for operating lease due after fifth fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

LesseeOperatingLeaseLiabilityPaymentsDue.label: Lessee, Operating Lease, Liability, to be Paid, Year One
LesseeOperatingLeaseLiabilityPaymentsDue.description: Amount of lessee's undiscounted obligation for lease payment for operating lease to be paid in next fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

LesseeOperatingLeaseLiabilityPaymentsDue.label: Lessee, Operating Lease, Liability, to be Paid, Year Five
LesseeOperatingLeaseLiabilityPaymentsDue.description: Amount of lessee's undiscounted obligation for lease payment for operating lease to be paid in fifth fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

LesseeOperatingLeaseLiabilityPaymentsDue.label: Lessee, Operating Lease, Liability, to be Paid, Year Four
LesseeOperatingLeaseLiabilityPaymentsDue.description: Amount of lessee's undiscounted obligation for lease payment for operating lease to be paid in fourth fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

LesseeOperatingLeaseLiabilityPaymentsDue.label: Lessee, Operating Lease, Liability, to be Paid, Year Three
LesseeOperatingLeaseLiabilityPaymentsDue.description: Amount of lessee's undiscounted obligation for lease payment for operating lease to be paid in third fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

LesseeOperatingLeaseLiabilityPaymentsDue.label: Lessee, Operating Lease, Liability, to be Paid, Year Two
LesseeOperatingLeaseLiabilityPaymentsDue.description: Amount of lessee's undiscounted obligation for lease payment for operating lease to be paid in second fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

LesseeOperatingLeaseLiabilityUndiscounte.label: Lessee, Operating Lease, Liability, Undiscounted Excess Amount
LesseeOperatingLeaseLiabilityUndiscounte.description: Amount of lessee's undiscounted obligation for lease payments in excess of discounted obligation for lease payments for operating lease.

LifeSettlementContractsFairValueMethodGa.label: Life Settlement Contracts, Fair Value Method, Gain (Loss)
LifeSettlementContractsFairValueMethodGa.description: This item represents the gains or losses recognized and realized during the period on investments in life settlement contracts sold during the period.

OperatingLeaseExpense.label: Operating Lease, Expense
OperatingLeaseExpense.description: Amount of operating lease expense. Excludes sublease income.

OperatingLeaseLiability.label: Operating Lease, Liability
OperatingLeaseLiability.description: Present value of lessee's discounted obligation for lease payments from operating lease.

OperatingLeaseLiabilityCurrent.label: Operating Lease, Liability, Current
OperatingLeaseLiabilityCurrent.description: Present value of lessee's discounted obligation for lease payments from operating lease, classified as current.

OperatingLeaseLiabilityNoncurrent.label: Operating Lease, Liability, Noncurrent
OperatingLeaseLiabilityNoncurrent.description: Present value of lessee's discounted obligation for lease payments from operating lease, classified as noncurrent.

OperatingLeaseRightOfUseAsset.label: Operating Lease, Right-of-Use Asset
OperatingLeaseRightOfUseAsset.description: Amount of lessee's right to use underlying asset under operating lease.

OperatingLeaseWeightedAverageDiscountRat.label: Operating Lease, Weighted Average Discount Rate, Percent
OperatingLeaseWeightedAverageDiscountRat.description: Weighted average discount rate for operating lease calculated at point in time.

OperatingLossCarryforwards.label: Operating Loss Carryforwards
OperatingLossCarryforwards.description: Amount of operating loss carryforward, before tax effects, available to reduce future taxable income under enacted tax laws.

OtherCashEquivalentsAtCarryingValue.label: Other Cash Equivalents, at Carrying Value
OtherCashEquivalentsAtCarryingValue.description: Amount of short-term, highly liquid investments that are both readily convertible to known amounts of cash and so near their maturity that they present insignificant risk of changes in value because of changes in interest rates, classified as other. Excludes cash and cash equivalents within disposal group and discontinued operation.

OtherDepreciationAndAmortization.label: Other Depreciation and Amortization
OtherDepreciationAndAmortization.description: Amount of expense charged against earnings to allocate the cost of tangible and intangible assets over their remaining economic lives, classified as other.

OtherInventoryInventoryAtOffSitePremises.label: Other Inventory, Inventory at off Site Premises, Gross
OtherInventoryInventoryAtOffSitePremises.description: Gross amount of merchandise or materials to which the entity holds the title, but physically at another entity's facilities (for example, but not limited to, work in process may be temporarily at the site of a subcontractor).

OtherNoncashIncomeExpense.label: Other Noncash Income (Expense)
OtherNoncashIncomeExpense.description: Amount of income (expense) included in net income that results in no cash inflow (outflow), classified as other.

PaymentOfFinancingAndStockIssuanceCosts.label: Payment of Financing and Stock Issuance Costs
PaymentOfFinancingAndStockIssuanceCosts.description: The total of the cash outflow during the period which has been paid to third parties in connection with debt origination, which will be amortized over the remaining maturity period of the associated long-term debt and the cost incurred directly for the issuance of equity securities.

PaymentsToAcquireBuildings.label: Payments to Acquire Buildings
PaymentsToAcquireBuildings.description: The cash outflow for acquisition of buildings (properties) whether for investment or use.

ProvisionForDoubtfulAccounts.label: Accounts Receivable, Credit Loss Expense (Reversal)
ProvisionForDoubtfulAccounts.description: Amount of expense (reversal of expense) for expected credit loss on accounts receivable.

ProvisionForOtherCreditLosses.label: Provision for Other Credit Losses
ProvisionForOtherCreditLosses.description: Amount of expense related to credit loss from transactions other than loan and lease transactions.

RestrictedInvestments.label: Restricted Investments
RestrictedInvestments.description: Investments which are not defined as or included in marketable (debt, equity, or other) securities whose use is restricted in whole or in part, generally by contractual agreements or regulatory requirements. For use in an unclassified balance sheet.

SecurityDeposit.label: Security Deposit
SecurityDeposit.description: The amount of an asset, typically cash, provided to a counterparty to provide certain assurance of performance by the entity pursuant to the terms of a written or oral agreement, such as a lease.

StockIssuedDuringPeriodSharesIssuedForSe.label: Stock Issued During Period, Shares, Issued for Services
StockIssuedDuringPeriodSharesIssuedForSe.description: Number of shares issued in lieu of cash for services contributed to the entity. Number of shares includes, but is not limited to, shares issued for services contributed by vendors and founders.

StockIssuedDuringPeriodValueShareBasedCo.label: Shares Issued, Value, Share-based Payment Arrangement, after Forfeiture
StockIssuedDuringPeriodValueShareBasedCo.description: Value, after forfeiture, of shares issued under share-based payment arrangement. Excludes employee stock ownership plan (ESOP).

AccountsReceivableGross.label: Accounts Receivable, before Allowance for Credit Loss
AccountsReceivableGross.description: Amount, before allowance for credit loss, of right to consideration from customer for product sold and service rendered in normal course of business.

AdditionalPaidInCapitalCommonStock.label: Additional Paid in Capital, Common Stock
AdditionalPaidInCapitalCommonStock.description: Value received from shareholders in common stock-related transactions that are in excess of par value or stated value and amounts received from other stock-related transactions. Includes only common stock transactions (excludes preferred stock transactions). May be called contributed capital, capital in excess of par, capital surplus, or paid-in capital.

AllowanceForDoubtfulAccountsReceivable.label: Accounts Receivable, Allowance for Credit Loss
AllowanceForDoubtfulAccountsReceivable.description: Amount of allowance for credit loss on accounts receivable.

AssetsNet.label: Net Assets
AssetsNet.description: The net of assets and liabilities.

BrokerageCommissionsRevenue.label: Brokerage Commissions Revenue
BrokerageCommissionsRevenue.description: Amount of commission revenue from buying and selling securities on behalf of customers.

CapitalUnitsTotalCostToInvestors.label: Capital Units, Cost to Investors
CapitalUnitsTotalCostToInvestors.description: Cost to investors of each class of capital shares or other capital units.

ClosedBlockOperationsOtherRevenue.label: Closed Block Operations, Other Revenue
ClosedBlockOperationsOtherRevenue.description: Amount of revenue classified as other allocated to the closed block.

CommonUnitIssued.label: Common Unit, Issued
CommonUnitIssued.description: Number of common units issued of limited liability company (LLC).

DepreciationAndAmortization.label: Depreciation, Depletion and Amortization, Nonproduction
DepreciationAndAmortization.description: The current period expense charged against earnings on long-lived, physical assets not used in production, and which are not intended for resale, to allocate or recognize the cost of such assets over their useful lives; or to record the reduction in book value of an intangible asset over the benefit period of such asset; or to reflect consumption during the period of an asset that is not used in production.

DepreciationDepletionAndAmortization.label: Depreciation, Depletion and Amortization
DepreciationDepletionAndAmortization.description: The aggregate expense recognized in the current period that allocates the cost of tangible assets, intangible assets, or depleting assets to periods that benefit from use of the assets.

DividendsPayableCurrentAndNoncurrent.label: Dividends Payable
DividendsPayableCurrentAndNoncurrent.description: Carrying value as of the balance sheet date of dividends declared but unpaid on equity securities issued by the entity and outstanding.

EquitySecuritiesFvNi.label: Equity Securities, FV-NI
EquitySecuritiesFvNi.description: Amount of investment in equity security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in net income (FV-NI).

EquitySecuritiesFvNiMeasurementInput.label: Equity Securities, FV-NI, Measurement Input
EquitySecuritiesFvNiMeasurementInput.description: Value of input used to measure investment in equity security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in net income (FV-NI).

EquitySecuritiesWithoutReadilyDeterminab.label: Equity Securities without Readily Determinable Fair Value, Downward Price Adjustment, Cumulative Amount
EquitySecuritiesWithoutReadilyDeterminab.description: Amount of cumulative loss from downward price adjustment on investment in equity security without readily determinable fair value.

EquitySecuritiesWithoutReadilyDeterminab.label: Equity Securities without Readily Determinable Fair Value, Upward Price Adjustment, Cumulative Amount
EquitySecuritiesWithoutReadilyDeterminab.description: Amount of cumulative gain from upward price adjustment on investment in equity security without readily determinable fair value.

ImpairmentOfLongLivedAssetsToBeDisposedO.label: Impairment of Long-Lived Assets to be Disposed of
ImpairmentOfLongLivedAssetsToBeDisposedO.description: The aggregate amount of write-downs for impairments recognized during the period for long-lived assets held for abandonment, exchange or sale.

InformationTechnologyAndDataProcessing.label: Information Technology and Data Processing
InformationTechnologyAndDataProcessing.description: The amount of expenses incurred in the period for information technology and data processing products and services.

InterestAndFeeIncomeLoansAndLeases.label: Interest and Fee Income, Loans and Leases
InterestAndFeeIncomeLoansAndLeases.description: The aggregate interest and fee income generated by: (1) loans the Entity has positive intent and ability to hold for the foreseeable future, or until maturity or payoff, including commercial and consumer loans, whether domestic or foreign, which may consist of: (a) industrial and agricultural; (b) real estate; and (c) real estate construction loans; (d) trade financing; (e) lease financing; (f) home equity lines-of-credit; (g) automobile and other vehicle loans; and (h) credit card and other revolving-type loans and (2) loans and leases held-for-sale which may include mortgage loans, direct financing, and sales-type leases.

InterestExpenseOtherShortTermBorrowings.label: Interest Expense, Other Short-term Borrowings
InterestExpenseOtherShortTermBorrowings.description: Interest expense incurred during the reporting period on other short-term borrowings.

LoansAndLeasesReceivableGrossCarryingAmo.label: Loans and Leases Receivable, Gross
LoansAndLeasesReceivableGrossCarryingAmo.description: Amount before allowance of loans and leases held in portfolio, including but not limited to, commercial and consumer loans. Includes deferred interest and fees, undisbursed portion of loan balance, unamortized costs and premiums and discounts from face amounts. Excludes loans and leases covered under loss sharing agreements.

LossContingencyDamagesAwardedValue.label: Loss Contingency, Damages Awarded, Value
LossContingencyDamagesAwardedValue.description: Amount of damages awarded to the plaintiff in the legal matter.

NoninterestIncomeOther.label: Noninterest Income, Other
NoninterestIncomeOther.description: Represents the total of noninterest income derived from certain activities and assets including (for example): (1) venture capital investments; (2) bank owned life insurance; (3) foreign currency transactions; and (4) mortgage servicing rights.

NoninterestIncomeOtherOperatingIncome.label: Noninterest Income, Other Operating Income
NoninterestIncomeOtherOperatingIncome.description: Amount of revenue earned, classified as other, excluding interest income.

OperatingCostsAndExpenses.label: Operating Costs and Expenses
OperatingCostsAndExpenses.description: Generally recurring costs associated with normal operations except for the portion of these expenses which can be clearly related to production and included in cost of sales or services. Excludes Selling, General and Administrative Expense.

OtherCostAndExpenseOperating.label: Other Cost and Expense, Operating
OtherCostAndExpenseOperating.description: The total amount of other operating cost and expense items that are associated with the entity's normal revenue producing operation.

OtherLiabilitiesNoncurrent.label: Other Liabilities, Noncurrent
OtherLiabilitiesNoncurrent.description: Amount of liabilities classified as other, due after one year or the normal operating cycle, if longer.

OtherLongTermDebtCurrent.label: Other Long-term Debt, Current
OtherLongTermDebtCurrent.description: Amount of long-term debt classified as other, payable within one year or the operating cycle, if longer.

OtherNoncashExpense.label: Other Noncash Expense
OtherNoncashExpense.description: Amount of expense or loss included in net income that result in no cash flow, classified as other.

OtherReceivablesGrossCurrent.label: Other Receivables, Gross, Current
OtherReceivablesGrossCurrent.description: Amount, before allowance, of receivables classified as other, due within one year or the operating cycle, if longer.

OtherShortTermBorrowings.label: Other Short-term Borrowings
OtherShortTermBorrowings.description: Amount of borrowings classified as other, maturing within one year or the normal operating cycle, if longer.

ParticipatingMortgageLoansMortgageObliga.label: Participating Mortgage Loans, Mortgage Obligations, Amount
ParticipatingMortgageLoansMortgageObliga.description: The aggregate amount of the participating mortgage obligation at the end of the accounting period.

PaymentsOfCapitalDistribution.label: Payments of Capital Distribution
PaymentsOfCapitalDistribution.description: Cash outflow to owners or shareholders, excluding ordinary dividends. Includes special dividends.

ProceedsFromContributionsFromAffiliates.label: Proceeds from Contributions from Affiliates
ProceedsFromContributionsFromAffiliates.description: The cash inflow from an entity that is affiliated with the entity by means of direct or indirect ownership.

ProceedsFromIncomeTaxRefunds.label: Proceeds from Income Tax Refunds
ProceedsFromIncomeTaxRefunds.description: The amount of cash received during the period as refunds for the overpayment of taxes.

ProceedsFromSaleAndMaturityOfOtherInvest.label: Proceeds from Sale and Maturity of Other Investments
ProceedsFromSaleAndMaturityOfOtherInvest.description: The cash inflow associated with the sale and maturity (principal being due) of other investments, prepayment and call (request of early payment) of other investments not otherwise defined in the taxonomy.

ProceedsFromSaleOfNotesReceivable.label: Proceeds from Sale of Notes Receivable
ProceedsFromSaleOfNotesReceivable.description: The cash inflow associated with the sale of a borrowing supported by a written promise to pay an obligation.

PurchaseCommitmentRemainingMinimumAmount.label: Purchase Commitment, Remaining Minimum Amount Committed
PurchaseCommitmentRemainingMinimumAmount.description: Minimum amount to be expended to satisfy the terms of arrangements in which the entity has agreed to expend funds to procure goods or services, excluding long-term purchase commitments or unconditional purchase obligations.

SalariesAndWages.label: Salary and Wage, NonOfficer, Excluding Cost of Good and Service Sold
SalariesAndWages.description: Amount of expense for salary and wage arising from service rendered by nonofficer employee. Excludes allocated cost, labor-related nonsalary expense, and direct and overhead labor cost included in cost of good and service sold.

ShortTermBankLoansAndNotesPayable.label: Short-term Bank Loans and Notes Payable
ShortTermBankLoansAndNotesPayable.description: Amount of borrowings from a bank classified as other, maturing within one year or operating cycle, if longer.

ShortTermDebtPercentageBearingFixedInter.label: Short-term Debt, Percentage Bearing Fixed Interest Rate
ShortTermDebtPercentageBearingFixedInter.description: The portion of the carrying amount of short-term borrowings outstanding as of the balance sheet date which accrues interest at a set, unchanging rate.

ShortTermInvestments.label: Short-term Investments
ShortTermInvestments.description: Amount of investments including trading securities, available-for-sale securities, held-to-maturity securities, and short-term investments classified as other and current.

UnrealizedGainLossOnDerivatives.label: Unrealized Gain (Loss) on Derivatives
UnrealizedGainLossOnDerivatives.description: The net change in the difference between the fair value and the carrying value, or in the comparative fair values, of derivative instruments, including options, swaps, futures, and forward contracts, held at each balance sheet date, that was included in earnings for the period.

UnrealizedGainLossOnInvestments.label: Unrealized Gain (Loss) on Investments
UnrealizedGainLossOnInvestments.description: Amount of unrealized gain (loss) on investment.

WarrantsAndRightsOutstanding.label: Warrants and Rights Outstanding
WarrantsAndRightsOutstanding.description: Value of outstanding derivative securities that permit the holder the right to purchase securities (usually equity) from the issuer at a specified price.

TaxesPayableCurrentAndNoncurrent.label: Taxes Payable
TaxesPayableCurrentAndNoncurrent.description: Carrying value as of the balance sheet date of obligations incurred and payable for statutory income, sales, use, payroll, excise, real, property and other taxes.

AccruedSalariesCurrentAndNoncurrent.label: Accrued Salaries
AccruedSalariesCurrentAndNoncurrent.description: Carrying value as of the balance sheet date of the obligations incurred through that date and payable for employees' services provided.

AdjustmentsToAdditionalPaidInCapitalMark.label: Adjustments to Additional Paid in Capital, Fair Value
AdjustmentsToAdditionalPaidInCapitalMark.description: Amount of increase (decrease) to additional paid in capital (APIC) resulting from changes in fair value of common and preferred stock issued to employee benefit trust but unearned.

AllowanceForDoubtfulAccountsReceivablePe.label: Accounts Receivable, Allowance for Credit Loss, Period Increase (Decrease)
AllowanceForDoubtfulAccountsReceivablePe.description: Amount of increase (decrease) in allowance for credit loss on accounts receivable.

AntidilutiveSecuritiesExcludedFromComput.label: Antidilutive Securities Excluded from Computation of Earnings Per Share, Amount
AntidilutiveSecuritiesExcludedFromComput.description: Securities (including those issuable pursuant to contingent stock agreements) that could potentially dilute basic earnings per share (EPS) or earnings per unit (EPU) in the future that were not included in the computation of diluted EPS or EPU because to do so would increase EPS or EPU amounts or decrease loss per share or unit amounts for the period presented.

BusinessCombinationConsiderationTransfer.label: Business Combination, Consideration Transferred, Other
BusinessCombinationConsiderationTransfer.description: Amount of tangible or intangible assets, including a business or subsidiary of the acquirer transferred by the entity to the former owners of the acquiree. Excludes cash.

ClassOfWarrantOrRightExercisePriceOfWarr.label: Class of Warrant or Right, Exercise Price of Warrants or Rights
ClassOfWarrantOrRightExercisePriceOfWarr.description: Exercise price per share or per unit of warrants or rights outstanding.

DebtInstrumentConvertibleThresholdConsec.label: Debt Instrument, Convertible, Threshold Consecutive Trading Days
DebtInstrumentConvertibleThresholdConsec.description: Threshold period of specified consecutive trading days within which common stock price to conversion price of convertible debt instrument must exceed threshold percentage for specified number of trading days to trigger conversion feature.

DeferredTaxAssetsNet.label: Deferred Tax Assets, Net of Valuation Allowance
DeferredTaxAssetsNet.description: Amount after allocation of valuation allowances of deferred tax asset attributable to deductible temporary differences and carryforwards.

DefinedContributionPlanMaximumAnnualCont.label: Defined Contribution Plan, Maximum Annual Contributions Per Employee, Amount
DefinedContributionPlanMaximumAnnualCont.description: Maximum amount the employee may contribute to a defined contribution plan.

DefinedContributionPlanMaximumAnnualCont.label: Defined Contribution Plan, Maximum Annual Contributions Per Employee, Percent
DefinedContributionPlanMaximumAnnualCont.description: Maximum percentage of employee gross pay the employee may contribute to a defined contribution plan.

Deposits.label: Deposits
Deposits.description: The aggregate of all deposit liabilities held by the entity, including foreign and domestic, interest and noninterest bearing; may include demand deposits, saving deposits, Negotiable Order of Withdrawal (NOW) and time deposits among others.

EffectiveIncomeTaxRateReconciliationTaxS.label: Effective Income Tax Rate Reconciliation, Tax Settlement, Percent
EffectiveIncomeTaxRateReconciliationTaxS.description: Percentage of the difference between reported income tax expense (benefit) and expected income tax expense (benefit) computed by applying the domestic federal statutory income tax rates to pretax income (loss) from continuing operations attributable to income tax settlements. Including, but not limited to, domestic tax settlement, foreign tax settlement, state and local tax settlement, and other tax settlements.

ExcessStockSharesOutstanding.label: Excess Stock, Shares Outstanding
ExcessStockSharesOutstanding.description: Number of shares of excess stock held by shareholders.

FinancingReceivableAllowanceForCreditLos.label: Financing Receivable, Allowance for Credit Loss, Writeoff
FinancingReceivableAllowanceForCreditLos.description: Amount of writeoff of financing receivable, charged against allowance for credit loss.

IncomeTaxReconciliationChangeInDeferredT.label: Effective Income Tax Rate Reconciliation, Change in Deferred Tax Assets Valuation Allowance, Amount
IncomeTaxReconciliationChangeInDeferredT.description: Amount of the difference between reported income tax expense (benefit) and expected income tax expense (benefit) computed by applying the domestic federal statutory income tax rates to pretax income (loss) from continuing operations attributable to increase (decrease) in the valuation allowance for deferred tax assets.

IncomeTaxReconciliationPriorYearIncomeTa.label: Effective Income Tax Rate Reconciliation, Prior Year Income Taxes, Amount
IncomeTaxReconciliationPriorYearIncomeTa.description: Amount of the difference between reported income tax expense (benefit) and expected income tax expense (benefit) computed by applying the domestic federal statutory income tax rates to pretax income (loss) from continuing operations attributable to revisions of previously reported income tax expense (benefit).

InterestExpenseDebt.label: Interest Expense, Debt
InterestExpenseDebt.description: Amount of the cost of borrowed funds accounted for as interest expense for debt.

InterestReceivable.label: Interest Receivable
InterestReceivable.description: Carrying amount as of the balance sheet date of interest earned but not received. Also called accrued interest or accrued interest receivable.

LiabilitiesFairValueDisclosure.label: Financial and Nonfinancial Liabilities, Fair Value Disclosure
LiabilitiesFairValueDisclosure.description: Fair value of financial and nonfinancial obligations.

LitigationSettlementAmountAwardedToOther.label: Litigation Settlement, Amount Awarded to Other Party
LitigationSettlementAmountAwardedToOther.description: Amount awarded to other party in judgment or settlement of litigation.

LoansReceivableFairValueDisclosure.label: Loans Receivable, Fair Value Disclosure
LoansReceivableFairValueDisclosure.description: Fair value portion of loan receivable, including, but not limited to, mortgage loans held for investment, finance receivables held for investment, policy loans on insurance contracts.

NotesAndLoansReceivableNetCurrent.label: Financing Receivable, after Allowance for Credit Loss, Current
NotesAndLoansReceivableNetCurrent.description: Amount, after allowance for credit loss, of financing receivable, classified as current. Includes, but is not limited to, notes and loan receivable.

NotesAndLoansReceivableNetNoncurrent.label: Financing Receivable, after Allowance for Credit Loss, Noncurrent
NotesAndLoansReceivableNetNoncurrent.description: Amount, after allowance for credit loss, of financing receivable, classified as noncurrent.

NotesReceivableFairValueDisclosure.label: Notes Receivable, Fair Value Disclosure
NotesReceivableFairValueDisclosure.description: Fair value portion of an agreement for an unconditional promise by the maker to pay the holder a definite sum of money at a future date.

NumberOfOperatingSegments.label: Number of Operating Segments
NumberOfOperatingSegments.description: Number of operating segments. An operating segment is a component of an enterprise: (a) that engages in business activities from which it may earn revenues and incur expenses (including revenues and expenses relating to transactions with other components of the same enterprise), (b) whose operating results are regularly reviewed by the enterprise's chief operating decision maker to make decisions about resources to be allocated to the segment and assess its performance, and (c) for which discrete financial information is available. An operating segment may engage in business activities for which it has yet to earn revenues, for example, start-up operations may be operating segments before earning revenues.

OperatingLeaseCost.label: Operating Lease, Cost
OperatingLeaseCost.description: Amount of single lease cost, calculated by allocation of remaining cost of lease over remaining lease term. Includes, but is not limited to, single lease cost, after impairment of right-of-use asset, calculated by amortization of remaining right-of-use asset and accretion of lease liability.

OtherAccruedLiabilitiesCurrent.label: Other Accrued Liabilities, Current
OtherAccruedLiabilitiesCurrent.description: Amount of expenses incurred but not yet paid classified as other, due within one year or the normal operating cycle, if longer.

OtherComprehensiveIncomeLossForeignCurre.label: Other Comprehensive Income (Loss), Foreign Currency Transaction and Translation Adjustment, Net of Tax
OtherComprehensiveIncomeLossForeignCurre.description: Amount after tax and reclassification adjustments of gain (loss) on foreign currency translation adjustments, foreign currency transactions designated and effective as economic hedges of a net investment in a foreign entity and intra-entity foreign currency transactions that are of a long-term-investment nature.

PaymentsForFees.label: Payments for Other Fees
PaymentsForFees.description: Amount of cash outflow for fees classified as other.

PaymentsToAcquireLongtermInvestments.label: Payments to Acquire Long-term Investments
PaymentsToAcquireLongtermInvestments.description: The cash outflow for securities or other assets acquired, which qualify for treatment as an investing activity and are to be liquidated, if necessary, beyond the current operating cycle. Includes cash flows from securities classified as trading securities that were acquired for reasons other than sale in the long-term.

ProceedsFromIssuanceOfWarrants.label: Proceeds from Issuance of Warrants
ProceedsFromIssuanceOfWarrants.description: The cash inflow from issuance of rights to purchase common shares at predetermined price (usually issued together with corporate debt).

ProceedsFromSaleOfPropertyPlantAndEquipm.label: Proceeds from Sale of Property, Plant, and Equipment
ProceedsFromSaleOfPropertyPlantAndEquipm.description: The cash inflow from the sale of long-lived, physical assets that are used in the normal conduct of business to produce goods and services and not intended for resale.

ProceedsFromShortTermDebt.label: Proceeds from Short-term Debt
ProceedsFromShortTermDebt.description: The cash inflow from a borrowing having initial term of repayment within one year or the normal operating cycle, if longer.

ProfessionalFees.label: Professional Fees
ProfessionalFees.description: A fee charged for services from professionals such as doctors, lawyers and accountants. The term is often expanded to include other professions, for example, pharmacists charging to maintain a medicinal profile of a client or customer.

RepaymentsOfShortTermDebt.label: Repayments of Short-term Debt
RepaymentsOfShortTermDebt.description: The cash outflow for a borrowing having initial term of repayment within one year or the normal operating cycle, if longer.

RestrictedCashAndCashEquivalentsAtCarryi.label: Restricted Cash and Cash Equivalents, Current
RestrictedCashAndCashEquivalentsAtCarryi.description: Amount of cash and cash equivalents restricted as to withdrawal or usage, classified as current. Cash includes, but is not limited to, currency on hand, demand deposits with banks or financial institutions, and other accounts with general characteristics of demand deposits. Cash equivalents include, but are not limited to, short-term, highly liquid investments that are both readily convertible to known amounts of cash and so near their maturity that they present insignificant risk of changes in value because of changes in interest rates.

RightOfUseAssetObtainedInExchangeForOper.label: Right-of-Use Asset Obtained in Exchange for Operating Lease Liability
RightOfUseAssetObtainedInExchangeForOper.description: Amount of increase in right-of-use asset obtained in exchange for operating lease liability.

ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.label: Share-based Compensation Arrangement by Share-based Payment Award, Options, Forfeitures in Period
ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.description: The number of shares under options that were cancelled during the reporting period as a result of occurrence of a terminating event specified in contractual agreements pertaining to the stock option plan.

ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.label: Share-based Compensation Arrangement by Share-based Payment Award, Shares Issued in Period
ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.description: Number of shares issued under share-based payment arrangement.

SharesHeldInEmployeeStockOptionPlanCommi.label: Shares Held in Employee Stock Option Plan, Committed-to-be-Released
SharesHeldInEmployeeStockOptionPlanCommi.description: Number of committed-to-be-released shares held by the Employee Stock Option Plan at balance sheet date. Committed-to-be-released shares are shares that will be released in the future and will be allocated to employees for services rendered in an accounting period. These shares are legally released from suspense and from serving as collateral for ESOP debt as a result of payment of debt service.

StockIssued1.label: Stock Issued
StockIssued1.description: The fair value of stock issued in noncash financing activities.

StockIssuedDuringPeriodSharesConversionO.label: Stock Issued During Period, Shares, Conversion of Units
StockIssuedDuringPeriodSharesConversionO.description: The number of shares issued during the period upon the conversion of units. An example of a convertible unit is an umbrella partnership real estate investment trust unit (UPREIT unit).

ValuationAllowanceDeferredTaxAssetChange.label: Valuation Allowance, Deferred Tax Asset, Increase (Decrease), Amount
ValuationAllowanceDeferredTaxAssetChange.description: Amount of increase (decrease) in the valuation allowance for a specified deferred tax asset.

GainLossOnSaleOfOtherAssets.label: Gain (Loss) on Disposition of Other Assets
GainLossOnSaleOfOtherAssets.description: Amount of gain (loss) on sale or disposal of other assets.

LegalFees.label: Legal Fees
LegalFees.description: The amount of expense provided in the period for legal costs incurred on or before the balance sheet date pertaining to resolved, pending or threatened litigation, including arbitration and mediation proceedings.

SupplementalDeferredPurchasePrice.label: Supplemental Deferred Purchase Price
SupplementalDeferredPurchasePrice.description: A device of credit enhancement where a part of the purchase price for the receivable/ payable is retained to serve as a cash collateral.

TemporaryEquityForeignCurrencyTranslatio.label: Temporary Equity, Foreign Currency Translation Adjustments
TemporaryEquityForeignCurrencyTranslatio.description: Adjustments to temporary equity resulting from foreign currency translation adjustments.
